post:
**General Information:**

        ClamHost OpenVZ VPS's with 1024MB of RAM, 15GB of RAID 10 SSD Storage, 1 IPv4 included, 20Gbps DDoS Mitigation, hosted in our quarter cab in Los Angeles. 
        All our VPS are Unmanaged by default, but for an extra $3.50 Per Month we offer a Full Management on any VPS. We can even help with multiple software configurations!

        Just email sales@clamhost.com if you have any questions relating to any of our products and services.

**Node Specs**

     Dual L5520
     42GB RAM DDR3 1333Mhz ECC
     4X 256GB SSD Enterprise SSDss
     Enterprise HP Grade Hardware
     Hardware RAID 10 Adaptec 6805 + BBU

     20Gbps DDoS Mitigation

     8 hour resolution on all tickets

**Why Choose ClamHost:**
